summary: My personal collection of useful and essential batch files to cheat your way to boredom.
descriptionHtml:
My personal collection of useful and essential batch files to cheat your way to boredom.

That last part was sarcasm. Anyway, here they are. As usual, you copy them into your Game folder, not the /Data subfolder.
No Manager support whatsoever from me. No support in general. If you don't know how to mod that's your problem, not mine.


Regards,
Ed
author: Edward Herpington the 3rd
